title: Kagoshima
description: Kagoshima, in southern Japan, is known for its stunning views of Sakurajima, an active volcano that dominates the skyline. This is where I spent most of my time in Japan, and it holds a special place in my heart.

images.title: Sakurajima from Yoshino Park
images.description: We loved spending time in Yoshino Park when I was a kid, and its amazing view of Sakurajima was certainly part of the reason. I'm not actually sure what year this photo was taken.

images.title: Sakurajima from our Yoshino house
images.description: This is a view of Sakurajima from our house in Yoshino, exact year unknown. It would have been between 1975 and 1977, I think.
